posts.body:
>The Surge

Game is okay. One of the better Souls clones out there. The industrial theme does get pretty tiresome and boring after a while but the DLCs are pretty neat. Even if they are short. Bought the game on a sale though so I'm not really complaining
**This is all so fucking silly that it's laughable. I'm public enemy number one and all I do is play videogames and shitpost with you guys**
